definition: li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels

sentences.english: Let's do one more. Let's do lithium.
sentences.chinese: 我们再做一个，再来看锂的。

sentences.english: Holmes was partial to cocaine, while Brett needed lithium.
sentences.chinese: 福尔摩斯偏爱可卡因，而布雷特则需要锂盐。

sentences.english: The Li-I 2 battery has become the dominant battery choice for powering implantable pacemakers .
sentences.chinese: 锂碘电池成为植入设备的最多的能源选择。

sentences.english: The citrate method was adopted to prepare LiNbO3 ferroelectric film.
sentences.chinese: 采用柠檬酸盐法制备铌酸锂铁电薄膜。

sentences.english: Secondly, two novel ROF system schemes based on the LiNbO3 phase modulator are accomplished.
sentences.chinese: 采用铌酸锂相位调制器设计了两种新型的ROF系统。

sentences.english: Lithium complex grease caused the diversification of preparation.
sentences.chinese: 导致复合锂基润滑脂制备工艺的多样化。

sentences.english: Extracting lithium from lepidolite was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了从锂云母中提取锂的方法。

sentences.english: Extracting lithium from lepidolite was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了从锂云母中提取锂的方法。

sentences.english: Quenching the excess lithium metal was achieved with isoprene.
sentences.chinese: 锂金属淬火超额实现与异戊二烯。

sentences.english: The investigation on laser sintering of LiNbO3 ceramics is reported.
sentences.chinese: 采用激光烧结制备铌酸锂陶瓷的研究。

sentences.english: The future development prospects of Al-Li alloy research are summed up.
sentences.chinese: 分析和评述了铝锂合金今后的发展态势。

sentences.english: Olivine-type LiFePO4 cathode material was successfully synthesized by co-precipitation method.
sentences.chinese: 采用共沉淀法合成了橄榄石型磷酸亚铁锂正极材料。

sentences.english: A supersonic lithium vapor jet neutralizer with large aperture has been developed.
sentences.chinese: 本文叙述了大口径锂超声速流中性化器的研制。

sentences.english: These are single atoms. It has to be gas phase.
sentences.chinese: 这些都是单个原子，所以必须用气态形式的锂。

sentences.english: This is lithium, lithium. And this is all gas phase.
sentences.chinese: 这是锂，当然，我指的是气态锂。
